trait.name: Hold Breath
text: <$title_short_name$> can hold their breath for up to 15 minutes at a time.

action.name: Rapier
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
text: Sauriv adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, Sauriv must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
